thappayata rupiyal delaksha thisatadahaka alabhayak siduwini.mema anathura gana parikshana pawathwu panadura uthuru polisiye sarayan es alwis langama riyaduruta adhikaranaya hamuwe nadu pawarana ladi.aparikshakari les riyak gewi giya tayar sahithawa dhanaya kirima saha nosalakili lesa ema bas rathaya dhanaya kirima saha thappayakata rupiyal delaksha thisdahasaka alabhayak sidu kirima gana riyaduru warada piligaththeya.adhikaranaye peni siti idame thappaye ayithikaruwan alabhaya epayi adhikaranayata danwa sitiyeya.sesu chodana dekata warada karu wu riyaduruta rupiyal 3000.00 dadayak niyama kala panadura pradhana mahesthrath ruchira waliwaththa mahatha ohuta dadilesa awawada kara muda hariyeya..

ohu ha pakshaye thawath nayakayan thidenek, hitapu janadhipathini chandrika kumarathunga samaga 2004 di sabhagayakata athulu wemin kabinat thanathuru bharagena jamua niyoga kriyawata damimata udawu kala ha. 1983 di aarambha wunu than patan wargawadi yuddhayata udawu dun jawipe, 2005 sita 2008 awasanaya dakwa rajapaksha aanduwe pitasthara sahakaru lesa eeta srujuwa ma sahabhagi wiya.
mema gatalu nirakaranaya kara ganna thek ma hata intanet bhawithaya sima kirimata siduwi atha.
